comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: New-York tribune., June 06, 1915, Page 3, Image 49 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-06-06/ed-... calls her a "candy girl" not a "cigarette girl." She is Miss Mary Woodward. This is the 1915 garden party at Governors Island in aid of the Army Relief Society.
